sentences.en: a 25 watt amplifier
sentences.cn: 一台25瓦扩音器

sentences.en: All the speakers hook up to a single amplifier.
sentences.cn: 所有喇叭都接在单一的扩音器上.

sentences.en: Amplifier is electrical device which make sounds louder.
sentences.cn: 扩音器是一种使声音放大的电气装置.

sentences.en: Amplifier self - oscillates at a frequency depending on the velocity of the fluid.
sentences.cn: 放大器自激振荡的频率就取决于流体的速度.

sentences.en: Figure 1 is the OCL Principle stereo power amplifier circuit.
sentences.cn: 图1是本ocl立体声功放机的原理电路图.

sentences.cn: 常规微波激射器符号. 可指定微波激射器放大器 、 激光器或激光发生器.

sentences.en: I was not just one college kid, I was an amplifier for him throughout the whole computer science department.
sentences.cn: 我不仅是一个大学生，我同时也是那个可以帮他在整个计算机系中发声的扩音器。

sentences.en: It is important to connect the transducer and amplifier by a lowcapacitance , low - noise, coaxied cable.
sentences.cn: 传感器和放大器之间的联结采用低容抗, 低噪音的同轴电缆是很重要的.

sentences.en: It is the equivalent circuit of a triode amplifier circuit.
sentences.cn: 它是三极管放大器的等效电路.

sentences.en: Optically coupled isolation amplifier is of very good linearity.
sentences.cn: 光电耦合隔离放大器具有很高的线性度.

sentences.en: Please plug my guitar into that big amplifier, I love to be loud.
sentences.cn: 请把我的吉它插到那个大的扩音器上，我喜欢大点的声音。

sentences.en: Purpose: TV vertical output, audio output driver and general purpose amplifier applications.
sentences.cn: 用途: 用于电视场输出, 音频放大驱动级及一般放大.

sentences.en: The audio interface must support your amplifier and speaker setup.
sentences.cn: 音频接口必须支持您的扩音器和扬声器设置。

sentences.en: The guitar plugs into this amplifier.
sentences.cn: 这把吉他能接到这个扬声器上.

sentences.en: The signal is fed into a filter - amplifier which is transformercoupled to the video - detector.
sentences.cn: 这个信号送到滤波器 - 放大器,它是由变压器耦合到视频检波器的.

sentences.en: The transistor is an amplifier.
sentences.cn: 晶体管是一个放大器。

sentences.en: This amplifier and crossover network drive the subwoofer mentioned above.
sentences.cn: 该放大器和交叉的网络驱动器上面提到的低音炮.

sentences.en: This reduces gain but widens the amplifier's passband.
sentences.cn: 这方法降低了增益,但加宽了放大器的通频带.

sentences.en: We can use them as an amplifier.
sentences.cn: 我们可以将其当作放大器。

sentences.en: When someone says an amplifier's damping factor is 87, that's not enough.
sentences.cn: 如果有人说某一放大器的阻尼因子是87，那是不够的。

sentences.en: While working on a means of reducing amplifier distortion, he devised the negative feedback amplifier.
sentences.cn: 在研究减少放大器失真方法时他发明了负反馈放大器.
